content_html: Kathmandu, Sept 21: There are chances of heavy rainfall at one or two places of the hilly regions of Koshi and Bagmati Provinces today. With the weather remaining generally cloudy in Koshi, Madhesh, Bagmati and Gandaki Provinces, and partly cloudy in the rest of the Tarai regions, moderate rainfall is likely to take
